title: i got fucked
body: i was joining a ranked game when leauge crashed then when i tried to open it, it said reinstall leauge something went wrong so already im like fuck there goes my lp but then i tried to delete the folder it says i cant because its in use so not only did i lose lp i cant even play the game now

replies.body:
Sounds like you were in a real fustercluck; I'd be tearing my hair out too.

You said that the game crashed, but can you give me more info than that? When things started to go wrong, were there any error messages you got like a Window saying 'stopped responding' or a big ol' Bugsplat? Also, has this ever happened before, or is this a rare thing or a first time problem? Don't mean to be wordy but answering these should help me ID what happened. :)
i just uninstalled and reinstalled I used a virus protection software and i think it deleted one of the folders no probs now so it worked i guess thx though.
